answer:
Sure, here is the answer:

The text states that Islam encompasses beliefs that deal with the transcendent reality and those tenets that emanate from it in the realm of human legal and moral spheres. The whole, divinely-revealed cosmos is nothing but the embodiment of the One Reality. Muslims regard the sacred texts of the Old and New Testaments as the divine and holy words of God and believe in angels, prophets including Abraham, Moses, Jesus, and Muhammad.
